transcript.text: I'm Michael from North Carolina and I've
been following Q since November 2017 and
in that time I've witnessed myriad of
things that have led me to the
conclusion that Q is the real deal from
timed correlation with the president's
tweets informing us about events that
never hit the mainstream news to keeping
us informed about the cabal that is
doing everything in their power to
destroy our president but more than that
I've seen the results start to compound
as time goes on sealed indictments
resignations some arrests but even more
important than that excuse message think
for yourself use logic and break free
from all the lies that sadly has people
from my generation protesting and
marching against their own rights Q's
message it's to to put petty differences
and affiliations aside to come together
as Americans to demand the truth and to
wake up the rest of the world to that
truth q with the amazing health of the
anons
[Music]
have put together a full picture of a
country and a world that so often just
seems to not make any sense and it's q
says you know we're flying at 40,000
feet while the rest of the world is
flying at low altitude to say that
people like me people who think like me
people who follow Q have the potential
be violent just because we follow Q
couldn't be further from the truth
we trust the Q team we trust our great
President to fulfill the plan that
they've laid forward while they're
putting their trust in us to spread
their message here and abroad and we
were all waiting for the day when all
that we've learned is exposed to the
public view and where it can be
discussed on a real platform without you
know people being ridiculed for you know
being a conspiracy theorist or you know
whatever whatever turn they decide to
throw out that day but in conclusion I
just want to say God bless the queue
team god bless all of the Anand's out
there you guys have done some really
amazing work
god bless our amazing president and god
bless the United States of America where
we go one we go all
